scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.restart: powershell -Command "Get-NetTCPConnection -State Listen | Where-Object { $_.LocalPort -in @(3000, 3001) } | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_.OwningProcess -Force }; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; npm run dev"
scripts.check: powershell -Command "$ports=@(3000,3001); foreach($p in $ports){$c=Get-NetTCPConnection -State Listen -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object {$_.LocalPort -eq $p}; if($c){Write-Host \"Port $p: Running (PID $($c.OwningProcess))\" -ForegroundColor Green}else{Write-Host \"Port $p: Not running\" -ForegroundColor Red}}"
